messages.subject: Anyone caught by Pawel Nowak?
messages.msgSnippet: All, Sorry for the OT post, but has anyone here actually been caught by the fraudster Pawel Nowak in Poland? I know a lot of you have been contacted, but
messages.messageBody:
All,
Sorry for the OT post, but has anyone here actually been caught by the
fraudster Pawel Nowak in Poland?
I know a lot of you have been contacted, but looking for anyone who
lost money to him.
Am working on making his life a bit inconvenient.
Need a few confirmed victims. He offers Japanese Swords at a good
price with info, pics, id and other details, and never sends anything.
Been doing this for years. (No..I wasn't caught)
Please contact me at Sigp210(at)yahoo.com. Just need a name, email and
confirmation of being scammed.
